title: Ep. 44 - Stop Blaming Millennials For Everything
description:
Millennials are generally blamed for everything in our society, even though our country was already financially and culturally and spiritually ruined before my generation came of age. Yes, many of us tend to be entitled and selfish. But they learned it from their entitled, selfish parents, who seem to always get off the hook somehow. Maybe it's time to stop foisting all the blame on Millennials and start looking at our situation honestly.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
